SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal (11,0)) from :1/DEBC where DEBC_DEBH in (:2, :3)

Text.val: -- check if there are rows in MQDT
-- if there are no rows in the MQDT also delete the corresponding T203 row where
4. If T203_CODECREDITLIMIT <> DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT
6. Call BDH005 to update table DEBTOR_HELLER_SEARCH
For call Inform Limit Department / Mark for MQ185
... code creditlimit = 3 (Owner), 1 (Stand alone)
-- Report missing owner to MQ183 -> code creditlimit = 1 (Stand alone),
2 (Affiliate)
if DEBC_CODECREDITLIMIT <>3
if DEBC_CODECREDITLIMIT <> 2
-- Report probable affilite which must be connected to the new owner

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBH.DEBH_NO from :1/DHIC DHIC, :1/DEBH DEBH where DHIC.DHIC_DEBH = DEBH.DEBH_NO and DHIC.DHIC_INFS_CODE = 'KV' and SUBSTRING(DHIC.DHIC_ID, 1, 8) = ':2' and DEBH.DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT = 3 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select a.DEBC_ADMNO, a.DEBC_CLNTNO, a.DEBC_DEBH from :1/DEBC a where a.DEBC_DEBH = :2 and a.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and not ( exists( select * from :1/DEBC b, :1/DEBH DEBH where b.DEBC_DEBH = :3 and b.DEBC_ADMNO = a.DEBC_ADMNO and b.DEBC_CLNTNO = a.DEBC_CLNTNO)) for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT <> T203_CODECREDITLIMIT and DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT <> 1
If DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT <> T203_CODECREDITLIMIT and IsRowInDEBC
